description: This file provides utility functions for handling authentication tokens using localStorage, including setting, clearing, and checking authentication status.

methods.name: export function setTokens(access: string, refresh: string) { setTokens
methods.description: Stores access and refresh tokens in localStorage if running in a browser environment.

methods.name: export function clearTokens() { clearTokens
methods.description: Removes authentication tokens from localStorage if running in a browser environment.

methods.name: export function isAuthed(): boolean { isAuthed
methods.description: Checks if the user is authenticated by verifying the presence of tokens in localStorage.
